-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Generate regex-constrained strings for QuickCheck
--   
--   Generate regex-constrained strings for QuickCheck
@package quickcheck-regex
@version 0.0.3


-- | This module exports a <a>matching</a> function that turns a regular
--   expression into a generator for strings matching that regex. For
--   example:
--   
--   <pre>
--   &gt;&gt;&gt; import Test.QuickCheck.Regex (matching)
--   
--   &gt;&gt;&gt; import Test.QuickCheck (generate)
--   
--   &gt;&gt;&gt; generate (matching "[-a-z0-9._%]+@[-a-z0-9.]+\\.[a-z]{3,18}\\.(asia|eu|today)")
--   "9%az4rmek@rar1d8qvo04jkd1.agzy.asia"
--   </pre>
module Test.QuickCheck.Regex
matching :: String -> Gen String
